body_html: So my work around for this at the moment is that I wrote a function that monkeypatches the function in the estimator at execution and returns the loss. Not pretty but it works for my purposes. I'd still like to see people's opinions on this. It seems completely reasonable to me for this function to return the final loss.

body: So my work around for this at the moment is that I wrote a function that monkeypatches the function in the estimator at execution and returns the loss. Not pretty but it works for my purposes. I'd still like to see people's opinions on this. It seems completely reasonable to me for this function to return the final loss.
